name: TableTopicsAce
0:
”Alexa, open Table Topics Ace”
”Alexa, launch Table Topics Ace”
”Alexa, start Table Topics Ace”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: table topics ace
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Table Topics Ace helps Toastmasters members to improve their Table Topics speaking. You’ll be asked if you want to speak for 1 minute or 2 minutes. Then you’ll be given a random Table Topic to speak on. We now have more than 150 Topics in our list. Topics include countries, celebrities, situations, emotions, current affairs, sports. 

Although this skill is not authorized or affiliated with Toastmasters International, it was built by an enthusiastic Toastmasters member, from Ireland. I hope this Skill can help you become better at impromptu speaking. 
You can say:

"Alexa, open Table Topics Ace"
"Alexa, start Table Topics Ace"
"Alexa, launch Table Topics Ace"

...and then Alexa will ask you if you want to speak for 1 minute or 2, then give you a Table Topic.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
